https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8LXagtAY1WlosiLfnWqVP7wNoCA.jpg Vinayan is a transgender who is always at the receiving end of insults and unfair behaviour. His effeminate actions also earn him the ire of his own family. Will Vinayan ignore social norms and stay true to himself? Or will he bow down to diktats? Ardhanaari
